DOC.criteria: Male sex Healthy Aged 18 30 year Classified physically active International Physical Activity Questionnaire Anemia Inflammation Diabetes Cardiovascular disease Liver problem Alcoholics Smokers Illicit drug user Chronic user antiinflammatory drug Episode musculotendinous osteoarticular injury lower and/or column member last six month .
